metadata.synopsis: The tiefling refugee/scout declares she's clearing off when she realises the situation with the nearby githyanki warparty is getting too risky.

0.speaker: Ellyka
0.text: Mrag! That's it - I'm getting out of here!
0.context: NodeContext: Mrag pronounced 'mRAG' (means 'shit' in infernal language). The tiefling decides that things are getting too dangerous and runs off while she still can.
